column5: Richard, I see you got back to the lake on the 26th. Now the work begins. Looking accross the lake from BV toward Basil and Dawson Island, can you see open water anywhere? Hope you had a great winter. Marv
Surprised to see my name here.....Our bay is clear of ice and I can see open water at Rabbit Point ....should be about a week for the lake to open up to the west....forecast is for warm weather...
I've posted some ice-out photos on my blog at buenavista.livejournal.com They were taken May 1st..
Thanks for the reply. Hope you have a great summer. Marv
Can't see any ice to the west from Buena Vista but there must be some out there somewhere.

Rick, Satellite photos from yesterday the 6th show ice still in Big and Little Traverse Bays, Shoal Lake, and an area near the Barrier Islands. Big Traverse ice is pushed up against Big Island and Bigsby Island. You can't get out the south end of Basil Channel. If you want to look at the satellite, Here is the web address:http://ge.ssec.wisc.edu/ Click on "Modis Today" On the next screen, click on the LOTW area. On the next screen, be sure you are on USA3 and then click on 250 miles. On the next screen, just scroll down to LOTW. Marv
It's snowing today at Lake of the Woods - Hope the Lake doesn't freeze up again.....
